line_1: Soon then as business will permit,
line_2: We'll send you up another sheet,

line_1: (If heav'n so long a life permit)
line_2: Shall after his great father sit,

line_1: "Blest, if my lovely goddess will permit
line_2: "My humble vows thus sighing at her feet.

line_1: And which his portly Paunch would not permit,
line_2: Garters and Buckles, Task for him unfit,

line_1: And which his portly Paunch would not permit,
line_2: So this same limber Page to All performed It.

line_1: This self-pleas'd king of emptiness permit
line_2: At the dear toilette harmlessly to sit;
